pr_title: unify map lines stroke width between GMv2 and OSM maps

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be a separate method that uses a separate constant?
timeline.author: UniQP
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -286,15 +286,15 @@ private synchronized void drawHistory() {
                 historyObjs.addPolyline(new PolylineOptions()
                     .addAll(points)
                     .color(0xFFFFFFFF)
-                    .width(3)
+                    .width(DisplayUtils.getThinLineWidth() / 2f)

timeline.bodyText: Looking at the code changes above, I would expect the constant to be 7f.
timeline.author: UniQP

replies.bodyText:
Four different widths have been used in the past:

5f * density
8f * density
3f
7f
3
7

the first two being for the same, but in different map types, same for the last four, and the latter two being absolute values instead of density related.
I merged this into getThinLineWith() and getThinLineInsetWidth() now.
replies.author: moving-bits
